job description:
Job Title: Associate Scientist (JP4459)
Location: Thousand Oaks, CA
Employment Type: Contract
Business Unit: LM Clinical Release Testing
Duration: 3 years

3Key Consulting Inc. is looking for an Associate Scientist with 3+ years experience in cell biology for a global, CA-based, bio-pharmaceutical company.

Job Description:
This position is M-F, 8 hours per day, however has flexible schedule with occasional weekends and some holiday work as needed.Onsite. Position comprised of about 70% in a laboratory and 30% in an office setting.
Our ideal candidate will have a MS degree in field with 3+ years of experience in cell biology. Average candidate is BS in field with 5-6 years experience is cell biology. Must have lab cell assay experience, cell culture maintenance, reagents/media/buffer preparation and support of analytical testing. Will perform all cell maintenance, assist with cell-based assays, binding assays, ELISA and PCR.
  • Perform routine experiments in a phase-appropriate GMP setting
  • Generate robust and reliable data, organize and report data in validated system under minimal supervision.
  • Cell culture maintenance, reagents/media/buffer preparation and support of analytical testing.
  • Will perform all cell maintenance, assist with cell-based assays, binding assays, ELISA and PCR. Routine laboratory maintenance such as restocking, ordering and assistance in critical reagent management.
Top Must-Have
  • Cell culture experience.
  • Self-motivated
  • Ability to work under minimal supervision GMP experience
Basic Qualifications:
  • Familiarity with GMP laboratory and documentation practices.
  • Ability to enter data into electronic notebook, perform data integrity checks, verification reviews and effective data communication to the team and into verified systems.
  • Experience and ability to work in a matrixed, detail-oriented team environment.
  • Self-motivated and able to work under minimal supervision.
  • Great communication skills.
  • Willingness to adhere to timelines and work in a highly regulated environment.
Day to Day Responsibilities:
  • Perform routine experiments in a phase-appropriate GMP setting, generate robust and reliable data, organize and report data in validated system under minimal supervision.
  • Cell culture maintenance, reagents/media/buffer preparation and support of analytical testing.
  • Will perform all cell maintenance, assist with cell based assays, binding assays, ELISA and PCR.
  • Routine laboratory maintenance such as restocking, ordering and assistance in critical reagent management.
  • Familiarity with GMP laboratory and documentation practices.
  • Ability to enter data into electronic notebook, perform data integrity checks, verification reviews and effective data communication to the team and into verified systems.
Why This Position Is Open:
Supplement additional workload on team.

Employee Value Proposition:
Great opportunity to be part of a motivated team on cell-based and non-cell based assays.

Red Flags:
No cell culture experience no cell-based assay experience.

Interview process:
Phone interview followed by in-person

We invite qualified candidates to send your resume to resumes@3keyconsulting.com. If you decide that youre not interested in pursuing this particular position, please feel free to take a look at the other positions on our website www.3keyconsulting.com. You are also welcome to share this posting with anyone you think might be interested in applying for this role.
